title: Don't be a bloody idiot!
creator_credit: Tasmanian Film Corporation, Tasmania. Police Dept., Don Anderson and Edwin Moses
brief_description: What to do and what not to do when planning a trip into the Australian bush. Looks at safety and essential equipment. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
